description: This file defines a UserProvider class in Dart, used in a Flutter app to manage user profile data and notify listeners of changes. It interacts with a Firebase API wrapper to fetch and update user data.

classes.name: UserProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages the current user profile, fetching initial data on instantiation and providing a method to save updates.

methods.name: _bootstrap
methods.description: Private async method to initialize the user data by fetching from the API.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Public async method to update the user data through the API and notify listeners.
